name: AverageGasPrice
0:
”Alexa ask average gas price what is the price of regular gas”
”Diesel today's price”
”how costly is premium gas”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: average gas price
des: This skill uses fueleconomy.gov to fetch average gas price per grade. Just ask alexa about the average price of the gas type
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
